author: Staff Reporter
text:
As part of The Hindu In School initiative, a Principals’ Conclave 2015, a meet of schools principals, will be held here at Taj Coromandel on Saturday.

The event, which will be organised by SRM University, underlines The Hindu ’s commitment to promote quality education.

The event brings together academics, who will discuss the present situation and think ahead about the way forward.

The meet will also serve as a platform to share knowledge and collaborate on education. The conclave will witness experts shedding light on education in a new age. Professor Prabir K. Bagchi, vice chancellor, SRM University, will be the chief guest.
title: Principals’ Conclave
